name: RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent
description: The RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent interface represents events sent to indicate that DTMF tones have started or finished playing. This interface is used by the tonechange event.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
